nodes.text: Jimmy "Mac" McInerney is a Chicago-based podcaster and radio professional. He is the producer and co-host of RebelForce Radio, Star Wars Rebels: Declassified, Star Wars Influences, Star Wars Oxygen, and the owner of ShotGlass Digital. He co-hosted the Star Wars Celebration Anaheim Behind-The-Scenes Stage in 2015, produced the radio dramas Star Wars: Smuggler's Gambit and Star Wars: Smuggler's Bounty, and has contributed to several issues of Star Wars Insider.
